description: Möbius transform of A003963 (with alternate 0's omitted).
formula: Multiplicative with a(p^e) = (q-1)q^(e-1) where q = pi(p) = A000720(p). - _David W. Wilson_, Sep 01 2001
prog: (PARI) a(n) = {my(f=factor(2*n-1)); for (i=1, #f~, q = primepi(f[i, 1]); f[i, 1] = (q-1)*q^(f[i,2]-1); f[i, 2] = 1); factorback(f);} \\ _Michel Marcus_, Feb 27 2015
author: _Marc LeBrun_
extensions: More terms from _David W. Wilson_, Aug 29 2001
